Html:
I read thru several post where two functions are used, GetRow and GetCell coded in C-Sharp (which are also in the Samples and will not compile either). I converted both, GetRow converts fine but in GetCell I get errors on

 Dim presenter As DataGridCellsPresenter = GetVisualChild(Of DataGridCellsPresenter)(rowContainer)

I have Option Strict On, Option explcit On and Option infer On

Can someone assist with this problem or suggest another method to get a cells content?

 

Thanks...Kevin
